body.name: Post-it Super Sticky Notes, 3x3 in, 24 Pads, 2x the Sticking Power, Supernova Neons, Bright Colors, Recyclable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 17 mins
features: EXPERIENCE THE POWER OF 2X STICKINESS: Post-it Super Sticky Notes offer twice the sticking power of basic sticky notes, ensuring they stay put and won't fall off
STICK AND RESTICK ANYWHERE: These notes adhere firmly to walls, windows, doors, and other vertical surfaces, allowing you to move your reminders with ease
VALUE-PACKED CONVENIENCE: Each pack includes 24 pads of 3 in. x 3 in. notes, with 70 sheets per pad, providing an ample supply for your office, work area, or classroom

VERSATILE AND ESSENTIAL: Post-it Super Sticky Notes are the perfect solution for shopping lists, reminders, to-do lists, color-coding, labeling, family chore reminders, brainstorming, storyboarding, and quick notes
VARIOUS SIZES AND SHAPES: Available in different sizes, with or without lines, to cater to your specific needs
EYE-CATCHING COLORS: Vibrant and colorful reminders are more likely to grab attention and be noticed
INTRODUCING THE SUPERNOVA NEON COLLECTION: Energize your ideas with the exciting colors of Acid Lime, Aqua Splash, Guava, Tropical Pink, and Iris Infusion
EXPLORE OUR COLLECTIONS: With 11 color collections, the Post-it Brand offers a wide range of options to suit every style and preference, whether at home, in school, or at the office
TRUST THE ORIGNAL CREATOR: Made in the USA with globally sourced materials, the one and only Post-it Note was invented over 40 years ago by the Post-it Brand
SUSTAINABILITY: Post-it Super Sticky Notes can be recycled
body.description: Ideas are out of this world with the electric colors of the Post-it Super Sticky Notes Supernova Neons Collection. Whether jotting down your daily to-do's, brainstorming big ideas, studying or setting reminders, colors and ideas are always brighter together. These sticky notes feature 2X the sticking power. They also stick and re-stick - allowing you to move your notes with you throughout your day. They’re ideal for walls, doors, windows and other vertical surfaces, and like all Post-it Notes, they stick securely yet remove cleanly without damage. Keep your ideas across your notebooks, classroom books, calendars or other documents. No tape or tacks are needed with adhesive notes, saving you money and time on office products or school supplies. A great memo pad, these are ideal for using for notes or reminders to yourself or others. Post-it Super Sticky Notes are the perfect solution for shopping lists, reminders, notes on computer screens, time tracking, to-do lists, marking cables, color-coding documents, reminding kids to do chores, storyboarding, scratch paper and agile processing. Each notes sheet is approximately 3 in. x 3 in., with 70 sheets per pad and 24 sticky note pads per pack. These colorful sticky notes include colors from the Supernova Neons collection including aqua, lime, bright pink, coral pink and lilac. All Post-it Notes are sourced from certified, renewable and responsibly managed forests, and all Post-it Notes are recyclable, so you can recycle them when they are no longer needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sticky note
reviews.reviewText: I love these sticky notes. The adhesive is just right. I don't have to worry about losing anymore of my sticky notes and the colors are so fun. Best thing was I got these on a Prime deal which made them super affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Post It Sticky Notes: A Business Elevation
reviews.reviewText: I’m visual and remember things better when I write them down. Post-it super sticky notes have always been my favorite companion. I love how they stick to almost any surface. I have tried other brands, but their adhesion is not as strong as Post-its, and I lose them.I also enjoy that they came out with more colors and sizes, making it easier to organize your notes and even organize discussions that I have with coaching clients. I like to use them during 1:1 sessions to brainstorm and then organize my thoughts -- the colors are great to help keep things interesting and they make great photos to send as follow-ups after the session.

reviews.reviewText: I recent bought non-post-it notes and they were the worst. These on the other hand stick. My work reminders were saved.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fun colors
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for my work and share it with coworkers. Attracts the eyes so I don’t forget what I need to do. Adheres well too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Post-It note collections color comparison photos
reviews.reviewText: Confused by Post-It note colors? Here are photos to make comparisons easier. All products bought from Amazon in April 2022.Sizes compared:3 x 3 inch (76 x 76 mm) squares in 4-color cabinet packs1.5 x 2 inch (35 x 48 mm) mini-notesPICTURE = COLOR GRID: Rows are collections, name on the left. Dark blue rectangle = THIS collection. Green circle next to name = Super Sticky.The left 6 columns of stickies are colors reused in several collections. Colors unique to certain collections are in the right columns. Numbers show where the color of a square sticky matches the color of a Mini Note.Photo colors are MOSTLY accurate. What looks like bright yellow (next to circled 4) is actually bright yellow-green.Collections in the grid are, by row, top to bottom:== 3 x 3 inches (76 x 76 mm) square, usually 70 per pad ==Post-it Super Sticky Notes, Assorted Bright Colors, 3 in x 3 in, 15 Pads/Pack, 45 Sheets/Pad… (654-15SSCP)https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08PW73XGF/Note: THIN PADS with only 45 stickiesPost-it Super Sticky Notes, 3x3 in, 24 Pads, Energy Boost Collection… (654-24SSAU-CP)https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00CMKA9HK/Post-it Super Sticky Notes, 3x3 in, 24 Pads… Primary Colors… (654-24SSAN-CP)https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00CMKA9BG/THIS PRODUCT ==> Post-it Super Sticky Notes, 3x3 in, 24 Pads… Supernova Neons… (654-24SSMIA-CP)https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01D8F5FKS/NOTE: "bright yellow" in the picture is actually intense light yellow-greenPost-it Super Sticky Recycled Notes, 3 in x 3 in, 24 Pads… Oasis Collection, Cool Colors… (654-24SST-CP)https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003DKEPRI/Post-it Greener Notes, 3x3 in, 24 Pads… Sweet Sprinkles Collection, Pastel Colors… (654R-24CP-AP)https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003H5APA0/== Mini-Notes, 1.5 x 2 inches (35 x 48 mm), 100 per pad ==Post-it Greener Notes, 1.5x2 in, 12 Pads… Sweet Sprinkles Collection, Pastel Colors… (653-RP-A)https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00006JNMT/Post-it Mini Notes, 1.5x2 in, 24 Pads… Beachside Café Collection, Pastel Colors… (653-24APVAD)https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00168CPYO/Post-it Mini Notes, 1.5x2 in, 24 Pads… Cape Town Collection, Bright Colors (Magenta, Pink, Blue, Green)… (653-24ANVAD)https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07PHGSQHC/PICTURE: STICKY STACKS: What I got by ordering 1 each of the collections in the color grid. Short square stacks are regular adhesive. All-blue column is 2 similar colors.PICTURE = NAMED COLLECTIONS: The same color can be in multiple collections. The same set of colors may be sold under multiple names (Oasis or Bora Bora). Cabinet packs contain only 4 of a collection's 5 or 6 colors. Some "same-looking" colors are similar, not the same. Are you confused yet?Quality seems high. Post-It stickiness is better than other brands I've tested, with less curling or coming loose. Super Sticky notes are stickier than regular Post-Its & harder to peel off my whiteboard.Minus 1 star for making names, colors, and what one is purchasing confusing, and for not offering a full range of 1-color bulk packs. For project boards (kanban) I want a decent array of visually distinct colors, with identical colors in large and small stickies. What I got includes colors that are visually similar enough to confuse, and large and small stickies whose colors don't match.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use these constantly in the classroom
reviews.reviewText: You just can't beat a Post-it! In my classroom, colorful Post-it notes are everywhere. We use them so many ways. My students get excited when they see them out because they know something fun is going to happen! We use them in games, as "do now" math problems, exit tickets, and more. The adhesive on a Post-it is far superior to off name sticky notes. The dry erase boards We have in classrooms have almost a greasy finish to them that makes other sticky notes fall off and flutter to the floor like fall leaves! Post-it Notes are the only brand that stick to the dry erase white board, even overnight! Totally worth the extra price over no name notes! 👌🏻

These colorful posted notes are excellent for the educators in my daycare to jot down observations on the children in the daycare. The different colors allow them to categorize the anecdotes according to the different areas of development!

reviews.reviewTitle: Post it’s were bent and squished. Box was old and ripped.
reviews.reviewText: Box it came in looked 10 years old. Torn cardboard and old box. Post it’s were bent and squished. Seemed very old, not new at all.
